dct_description_sm: Along the top is a view of the city from the river, this flanked by elevations of the Cathedral and the Senate House. The side and bottom borders are likewise made up of elevations and fird's eye views, among others of the Stock Exchange and the Hanse building.
There is a centrally placed insert map of the region around Antwerp, dedication in cartouche, explanatory paragraphs in Latin and Dutch, no watermark.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
